name: Confrontation: Scenarios Volume 1
description:
This add-on pack includes four scenarios for the original Confrontation game and requires it to be used with. These scenarios represent actual 20th Century conflicts:
  • Afghanistan - Soviet column attempting to force a passage through the mountain passes;
  • Angola - South-African Unita defends coastal strong-points against Cuban-trained forces;
  • Sinai - Egypt vs Israel across the Sinai desert;
  • Kent - alternative history with German invasion of Kent in 1940.
